text: John Keith Matthews (7 March 1934 – 2008) was a Welsh professional footballer who played as a winger. He made appearances in the English Football League for Wrexham in the 1950s, and also played in the Welsh leagues for Llay United and Blaenau Ffestiniog. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2008 deaths Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Blaenau Ffestiniog Amateur F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Keith Matthews (footballer)
